13:00 < csg> -ubuntu is very hard but is better than windows <-- Uuh, no it's not

it's probably silly to say that ubuntu isn't hard.  There are certain things about ubuntu that are harder than windows (configuring dual head monitors?  getting wireless to work... at least before gnome-network-applet or whatever it's called)
